original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca saṅkhitta sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabbaḥ

original: Saraṇaṁ bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Araṇaṁ bahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam bahiddhā dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saraṇaṁ bahiddhā ca araṇaṁ bahiddhā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇam bahiddhā ca araṇam bahiddhā ca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ bahiddhā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabbaḥ

original: 3.14.21. Saraṇaduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
3.14.21.1–7. Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
analyzed: paccaya catukka

original: Saraṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve pe avigate dve saṅkhitta sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabbaḥ

original: Saraṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbo.)
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve pe avigate dve saṅkhitta sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabbaḥ

original: 3.14.22. Saraṇaduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: sa raṇa duka sani dassana ttika

original: 3.14.22.1–7. Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
analyzed: paccaya catukka

original: Araṇaṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyāḥ eka adhipatiyāḥ ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhitta sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: Saraṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Araṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam a nidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Saraṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca araṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇam a nidassana appaṭighañca araṇam a nidassana appaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavāropi …pe… sampayuttavāropi vitthāretabbā.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca saṅkhitta sahajāta vāropi pe sampayutta vāropi vitthāretabbā

original: Araṇo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena
analyzed: araṇaḥ a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa a nidassana sa paṭighassa dhammassa sahajāta paccayena

original: paccayo … ekaṁ. (Aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, atthiyā ekaṁ, avigate ekaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paccayo eka aññamaññe eka nissaye eka atthiyāḥ eka avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo saraṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: saraṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ saraṇassa anidassana appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: paccayo … tīṇi. Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ tīṇi araṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa anidassana appaṭighassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri,
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca anantare samanantare cattāri

original: sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte
analyzed: sahajāte pañca aññamaññe dve nissaye satta upanissaye cattāri purejāte pacchājāte

original: āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte
analyzed: āsevane dve kamme cattāri vipāke eka āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri sampayutte

original: dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dve vippayutte tīṇi pe avigate satta

original: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetuyā satta na ārammaṇe satta saṅkhitta

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe cattāri

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe cattāri

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike pañhāvārassa anulomam pi paccanīyam pi anuloma paccanīyam pi paccanīya anulomam pi gaṇitaḥ evam gaṇetabba
